note.p: Irish-born clergyman. Son of Thomas Frederick Colby. BA, Cambridge (Caius), 1860. Ordained deacon, 1862. Curate, Claverley, Shropshire, 1863. Lived in Blaenffos, Pembrokeshire, Wales, in the 1870s.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/5539/81/4)
